titleStmt.title: OXFORD AND CAMBRIDGE ISLAMIC MANUSCRIPTS CATALOGUE ONLINE

msContents.summary: Prayers in Arabic with Turkish commentaries

msItem.title: Sūrat al-fātiḥah
سورة الفاتحة
msItem.note: NOTE: This record has been automatically generated with minimal modification from the corresponding entry in a printed catalogue. It may contain errors. Please, consult the References section below for more information.

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on the Bodleian Library's public card index of Arabic manuscripts with additional enhancements by the OCIMCO project team.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions).
